article.headline: DePaul 70, East Carolina 65
article.story: GREENVILLE, N.C. (AP) -- Drake Diener scored 21 points and Andre Brown had 19 points and eight rebounds to lead DePaul to a 70-65 victory over East Carolina on Saturday night. Diener made 6 of 8 shots from the field, including 6 of 7 from 3-point range. Brown shot 7 of 10 from the field, helping DePaul (11-7, 4-3 Conference USA) shoot 49 percent. Mike Cook had 17 points and six assists for the Pirates (8-9, 0-7), who led 36-32 at halftime. East Carolina shot 35 percent from the field in the second half and 39 percent for the game. Erroyl Bing finished with 15 points and Moussa Badiane had nine rebounds and two blocks for the Pirates. The Pirates have lost their last eight games while the Blue Demons have captured four of their last five. DePaul also has won all five meetings in the all-time series between the two schools.
